pr_title: Fix resubscribe of Query Handlers on Resource Exhausted exception

timeline.message: set stream to null on error, fixes resubscribe on RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED expection.

timeline.bodyText: Sounds fair. Is there a doable test class to be made which verifies that this works?
timeline.author: smcvb

replies.bodyText: I could only reproduce the issue when I was running on Docker, so probably timing related.
replies.author: MGathier

replies.bodyText: Shouldn't we make sure that the outbound stream is also properly "completed" before setting it to null? I'm afraid we'll be leaking connections if we don't close both sides.
replies.author: abuijze

replies.bodyText: Will create a new issue for this, as this needs to be done in more places.
replies.author: MGathier
